alert.note: Alert for New Madrid; Stoddard (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 7:36PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central New Madrid and southeastern Stoddard Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 736 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lilbourn. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Howardville around 755 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include New Madrid, Lilbourn and Hunter-Dawson State Historic Site. This includes Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 45 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
